document.discussion_title: Championship | Derby skipper Keogh signs new deal
document.topic_text: 11.08.2016 - 16:33 | Source: Derby County Derby skipper Keogh signs new deal Championship Republic of Ireland international Richard Keogh has signed a new long-term deal with Derby , the Rams have confirmed. The captain has penned a three-year deal with the club until summer 2019. The ex- Coventry defender has featured in 200 games for Derby so far. VIDEO: @RichardKeogh_6 has been talking to #RamsPlayerHD about signing a new contract at #DCFC #dcfcfans https://t.co/EiaREKUed6
